summary: An Ordinance ordering the refunding to John G. Mueller of the amount erroneously paid by him on April 25, 1907, for installments two to five inclusive, of the assessment for the Phinney Avenue, et al, water main, District No. 1007, on Lot sixteen (16), seventeen (17), and eighteen (18), in Block one (1), Hillman's Lake Front Division No. 1; and authorizing the City Treasurer to accept payment of John G. Mueller of installments two to five inclusive, of the assessment for the Phinney Avenue water main, District No. 1007, on lots sixteen (16), seventeen (17) and eighteen (18), Block one (1), Hillman's Lake front No. 4, without penalty on installments becoming deflinquent since April 25, 1907.
